name: Finances & Administration
purpose: Minimise the total time spent on administrative work

name: Internal Accountant
purpose: Settle payments and assisting our external accountant
accountabilities: Handling all bank payments (salaries, invoices, expenses)
Taking care of the legally required financial reports

name: Expenses monitor
purpose: Facilitate fair and transparent decisions regarding expenses
accountabilities: Showing transparently how money was spent on bigger expenses
Putting in perspective proposed expenses by other roles and reaching a joint decision
